channel.title: Kylin on Loving life and dreams.
channel.description: Recent content in Kylin on Loving life and dreams.

item.title: Kylin integrates Zeppelin presentation data
item.description: In fact, kylin’s own WEB UI has integrated the recommended graphical reports, with common line, column, and pie charts, which are perfectly sufficient for the initial presentation of the data. If you want a richer presentation, consider using other tools, and try the officially recommended Apache Zeppelin now.
